name: broken pursuer
description: A broken pursuer drone, now wrecked and motionless.  It could be gutted for spare parts.

name: broken seeker
description: A broken seeker drone, now crumpled and fallen. It could be gutted for parts.

name: inactive seeker
description: An autonomous drone designed to seek and exterminate enemy combatants. It's capable of delivering a single burst of 9mm rounds before closing to finish off its prey. It's currently inactive but ready to be deployed.

name: broken hunter drone
description: A broken hunter drone, now burnt and unpowered.  It could be gutted for parts.

name: inactive hunter drone
description: A dog-sized military drone designed to hunt out and exterminate enemy combatants. With a pair of barbed mandibles, it can prevent its prey from escaping. It is currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

name: broken chaser drone
description: A broken chaser drone, now shattered and disarmed. It could be gutted for parts.

name: inactive chaser
description: A relentless hoverdrone designed to chase down and exterminate enemy robots. It's capable of firing three .50bmg rounds before closing in to finish off its prey. It is currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

name: broken manhack
description: A broken manhack. It's far too damaged to be repaired, but could still be gutted for spare parts.

name: inactive venomhack
description: A manhack converted into a venomous stinging drone. The stingers of giant insects have been added in place of blades. It is currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the venomhack; it's hostile!
use_action.friendly_msg: The venomhack flies from your hand and begins dripping toxic chemicals.

name: broken manhack
description: A broken venom hack. It's far too damaged to be repaired, but could be gutted for parts.

name: inactive distractron
description: A manhack hastily rewired into a distraction device. The main blades have been removed, making it harmless, but also more difficult to hit. Mp3's of pre-Cataclysmic folk music have been added as a further distraction. It is currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the distractron; it's hostile.
use_action.friendly_msg: The distractron flies from your hand and lights up.

name: broken distractron
description: A broken distractron. It's too damaged to fix, but could be gutted for parts.

name: inactive smokehack
description: A manhack tinkered into a flying smoke generator. It makes a less effective weapon, but provides a good smoke screen. It's currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the smokehack; it's hostile.
use_action.friendly_msg: The smokehack flies from your hand and ignites.

name: broken eyebot
description: A broken eyebot, now fallen and sightless. It could be gutted for parts or jury-rigged into a new type of bot.

name: broken orb bot
description: A broken orb bot, now dark and lifeless. It could be repaired or stripped down to its eyebot frame.

name: inactive orb bot
description: A salavaged eyebot patched up with low-grade electronics. The camera has been replaced with a powerful floodlight. It's currently inactive but ready to be deployed.

name: broken skitterbot
description: A broken skitterbot, now sad and motionless.  It could be gutted for parts or jury-rigged into a new type of bot.

name: broken skaterbot
description: A broken skaterbot, now drained and unmoving. Could be repaired or stripped down to its skitter bot frame.

name: inactive skaterbot
description: A salvaged skitterbot rewired with consumer grade electronics. Small wheels have been kludged to the ends of its insectoid legs. It's inactive but ready to be deployed.

use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the skaterbot; it's hostile.
use_action.friendly_msg: The skaterbot spins its wheels and emits a cascade of sparks.

name: broken police bot
description: A broken police bot, now crushed and dirty. It could be gutted for parts or jury-rigged into a new type of bot.

name: broken shockbot
description: A broken shockbot, now powerless and inert. It could be repaired or stripped down to it's police bot frame.

name: inactive shockbot
description: A salvaged police bot mended with old circuitboards and car batteries. It's been covered with electrified barbed wire and given a makeshift shock gun. It is currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

use_action.friendly_msg: The shockbot emits a low electric hum and begins to amble about.

name: broken riot control bot
description: A broken riot control bot, now deformed and gasless. It could be gutted for parts or jury-rigged into a new type of bot.

name: broken solar bot
description: A broken solar bot, now dark and shattered. It could be repaired or stripped down to its original frame.

This is an inactive chicken walker.  Using this item involves placing it on the ground, loading the unit with the factory-loaded 5.56 rounds and 40mm cartridge grenades in your inventory (if you wish to divide your ammunition, set aside whatever ammunition you do NOT want to give the robot) and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the tank drone will then identify you as a friendly, roam around or follow you, and attack all enemies with a built-in firearm and grenade launcher.
//: cheating a bit with the volume due to lack of proper vehicle storage options

use_action.friendly_msg: The chicken bot rolls out and begins acquiring targets.
use_action.hostile_msg: The chicken bot swivels its turret and aims directly at you.  Don your brown pants!
use_action.//: Milspec, clearly designed with little concern for collateral damage.  What did you expect of a chicken walker?

name: inactive solar bot
description: A salvaged riot-control bot awkwardly welded together with an experimental laser turret. A layer of solar cells and blinking LED lights cover it's hull. It's currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the solar bot; it's hostile!
use_action.friendly_msg: The solar bot's lights flicker on as it boots up successfully.

name: broken security bot
description: A broken security bot, now busted and helpless. It could be gutted for parts or jury-rigged into a new type of bot.

name: broken killbot
description: A broken killbot, now peaceful and still. It could be repaired or stripped down to its security bot frame.

name: inactive killbot
description: A salvaged security bot repurposed into a lumbering engine of destruction. Extra layers of steel armor and a pair of chainsaws have been welded to the chasis. It's currently inactive but ready to be deployed.

use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the killbot! That ain't good.
use_action.friendly_msg: The killbot comes online and spins it chansaws in anticipation.

name: broken chickenbot
description: A broken chicken walker, now headless and defeated. It could be gutted for parts or jury-rigged into a new type of bot.

name: broken murder machine
description: A broken murder machine, now silent and mangled. It could be repaired or stripped down to its original frame.

name: inactive murder machine
description: A salvaged chicken walker, pieced back together into a shambling combat robot that's more terrifying than effective. It is currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the murder machine; it wants to murder you!
use_action.friendly_msg: The murder machine comes to life.

name: broken tank drone
description: A broken tank drone, lying in a heap of twisted metal. It could be gutted for parts or jury-rigged into a new type of bot.

name: broken droidnaught
description: A broken droidnaught. It could be repaired or stripped down to its tank frame.

name: inactive droidnaught
description: A gutted tank bot refurbished with vehicle parts and questionable wiring. The cannon has been replaced with a rapid-fire pneumatic hammer. It is currently inactive and ready to be deployed.

use_action.hostile_msg: You have made a very serious mistake. The droidnaught is now hostile.
use_action.friendly_msg: The droidnaught revs its engines as its systems comes online.

name: broken hazmatbot
description: A broken HAZMAT bot, now polluted and shattered. It could be gutted for parts or jury-rigged into a new type of bot.

name: broken cleaner bot
description: A broken cleaner bot, now corroded and filthy. It could be repaired or stripped down to its HAZMAT robot frame.

name: inactive cleaner bot
description: A salvaged HAZMAT robot refitted with second-hand circuits and plumbing supplies. It cleans by spraying an area with caustic fluids from an internal boiler. IT is currently inactive and waiting to be deployed.

use_action.friendly_msg: The cleanerbot charges up and begins bubbling over with noxious chemicals.
